newsitem.title: CZECH REPUBLIC: Bass to exercise option in Czech brewer PP.
newsitem.headline: Bass to exercise option in Czech brewer PP.

text.p: British brewer Bass Plc said on Monday it would probably exercise an option in Prazske Pivovary a.s. at the beginning of November to give it a majority stake in the Prague-based brewer.

"We have 46 percent in Prazske Pivovary now and we also have a five percent option exercisable at the beginning of November...I think we'll exercise that option," said Mervyn Childs, Bass country manager for the Czech Republic.
